tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance (
    compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    regulation_id UUID,
    approved BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_log_id FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES audit_logs(log_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_regulation_id FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES regulations(regulation_id)
);
